sentences.sentence: Churchill went to Harrow Public School.
At the age of twelve, his father sent him to Harrow Public School, which was famous for training English gentlemen.
sentences.translation: 12岁时，他的父亲把他送到哈罗公学，这所学校以培养英国绅士而闻名。

sentences.sentence: So did Winston Churchill, who almost failed out of Harrow, an elite British school.
sentences.translation: 温斯顿·丘吉尔也是如此，他差点从英国一所精英学校哈罗公学退学。
